gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Creating a quiz with QuizzaBoom is fast and powered by AI. Here's how to get started in minutes.
gettingStarted.step1: Sign in with Google or Magic Link from the homepage.
gettingStarted.step2: Click 'Create a Quiz' and choose your theme (General Knowledge, Sports, Science, History, etc.).
gettingStarted.step3: Select the game mode: Standard (classic quiz) or Strategic (with jokers and sabotage!).
gettingStarted.step4: Set the duration (5 to 60 minutes), difficulty (Easy, Medium, Hard), and language.
gettingStarted.step5: The AI generates unique questions in seconds. Each quiz is different!
gettingStarted.step6: Share the session code or QR code with your players. That's it!
gettingStarted.tip: Each quiz costs 1 credit. Buy credits from the Pricing page or use your B2B plan allocation.

gamePhases.title: Game Phases
gamePhases.description: Each question in a quiz goes through 5 phases. Understanding the timing helps players strategize.
gamePhases.step1: Theme Announcement (5 seconds) - The current theme is displayed (e.g. 'Geography', 'Cinema').
gamePhases.step2: Question Display (8 seconds) - The question appears on screen. Read carefully!
gamePhases.step3: Answer Selection (15 seconds) - Players choose their answer. In Strategic mode, jokers can be activated here.
gamePhases.step4: Results (5 seconds) - The correct answer is revealed and scores are updated in real-time.
gamePhases.step5: Intermission (5 seconds) - Brief pause before the next question. Check the leaderboard!
gamePhases.tip: Total time per question: ~38 seconds. A 20-question quiz lasts about 12-13 minutes.

jokers.title: Strategic Jokers
jokers.description: In Strategic mode, each player gets special jokers that can change the game! Use them wisely.
jokers.step1: Protection (shield icon) - Blocks all attacks against you for this round. Use it when you expect sabotage.
jokers.step2: Block (ban icon) - Prevents a chosen opponent from answering this question. They score zero!
jokers.step3: Steal (coin icon) - Steals 100% of a chosen opponent's points for this question. High risk, high reward!
jokers.step4: Double Points (star icon) - Doubles your score for this question. Combine with a correct answer for maximum impact!
jokers.step5: Each joker can only be used once per game. Timing is everything!
jokers.step6: Protection blocks both Block and Steal. If someone blocks you but you have Protection active, you can still answer.
jokers.tip: Pro tip: Save your Protection for later rounds when opponents are more likely to attack the leader.

hosting.title: Hosting a Quiz
hosting.description: As a host, you control the entire quiz experience. Here's how to run a perfect game night.
hosting.step1: After creating a quiz, you get a unique 6-character session code and a QR code.
hosting.step2: Share the code or QR with players. They scan it or enter the code at the join page.
hosting.step3: Wait for all players to join in the lobby. You can see who has connected in real-time.
hosting.step4: Press 'Start Quiz' when everyone is ready. The game begins with the first theme.
hosting.step5: Use the host controls: Pause the game, skip a phase, or monitor the live leaderboard.
hosting.step6: At the end, view final standings and optionally send results by email to all players.
hosting.tip: The host does NOT need a TV. The host dashboard works on any device (phone, tablet, laptop).

tvDisplay.title: TV Display
tvDisplay.description: Cast the quiz on a big screen for the ultimate experience! Perfect for bars, parties, and events.
tvDisplay.step1: Open the TV Display URL: your-domain/tv?code=SESSION_CODE (replace SESSION_CODE with your quiz code).
tvDisplay.step2: Cast this browser tab to your TV via Chromecast, AirPlay, or HDMI cable.
tvDisplay.step3: The TV Display automatically syncs with the quiz in real-time via WebSocket.
tvDisplay.step4: It shows: current question, answer options, timer countdown, theme, and the live leaderboard.
tvDisplay.step5: The TV Display is read-only. No interaction needed once loaded!
tvDisplay.tip: Multiple TVs can display the same quiz simultaneously. Perfect for large venues with several screens!

remotePlay.title: Remote Play & Multi-Site Competitions
remotePlay.description: QuizzaBoom supports remote play! Organize inter-site competitions where teams play from different locations.
remotePlay.step1: The host creates a quiz and shares the session code with all locations.
remotePlay.step2: Each location opens the TV Display URL (your-domain/tv?code=CODE) and casts it on their local TV.
remotePlay.step3: Players at each location join using the same session code on their smartphones.
remotePlay.step4: All players and TVs are synchronized in real-time via Supabase Realtime (WebSocket).
remotePlay.step5: The leaderboard updates live across ALL locations. Everyone sees the same scores instantly!
remotePlay.step6: One host controls everything. Players everywhere answer at the same time, on the same questions.
remotePlay.step7: Perfect for: family quiz nights across cities, corporate team building between offices, bar quiz leagues between venues.
remotePlay.tip: There is no limit on the number of TV displays. 1 host, unlimited TVs, up to 250 players!

playerExperience.title: Player Experience
playerExperience.description: Joining a quiz is simple and works on any device with a browser. No app download needed!
playerExperience.step1: Open the join page and enter the 6-character session code (or scan the QR code).
playerExperience.step2: Choose a display name and pick your avatar from 16 fun emoji options.
playerExperience.step3: Optionally enter your email to receive your results after the quiz.
playerExperience.step4: Wait in the lobby until the host starts the game.
playerExperience.step5: When a question appears, tap your answer before the timer runs out!
playerExperience.step6: In Strategic mode, activate jokers by tapping them before selecting your answer.
playerExperience.step7: Check the live leaderboard between questions to see your ranking.
playerExperience.tip: Lost connection? Don't worry! QuizzaBoom automatically reconnects you to the game.

emailResults.title: Email Results
emailResults.description: After the quiz, send personalized results to all players who provided their email address.
emailResults.step1: Players can optionally enter their email when joining the quiz.
emailResults.step2: After the quiz ends, the host can trigger 'Send Results' from the host dashboard.
emailResults.step3: Each player receives a personalized email with their score, ranking, and game stats.
emailResults.step4: Results include: total score, correct answers count, ranking position, and joker usage.
emailResults.tip: Emails are sent via SendGrid and respect GDPR consent. Players choose to share their email.
